FuncDef: This command shuts down (unmounts) the specified CPM(s).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the compact flash slot ID to be shut down or enabled. If cflash-id is specified, the drive is shut down or enabled. If no cflash-id is specified, the drive referred to by the current working directory is assumed. If a slot number is not specified, then the active CPM/CFM is assumed. Values-cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:. ParamDefault: Default- the current compact flash device
Specifies that all drives on the active CPM are shutdown or enabled.
Specifies that all drives on the standby CPM are shutdown or enabled.
